content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, nice to meet you. I am proposing a price of €1,200 per month. Remember, I am not considering anything other than the rental price, so we won't be discussing additional responsibilities, lease term conditions, or utility costs like heating, water, or electricity.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the apartment, but the price is a little high for me. I'm a student, so I have to consider my budget. Can you offer a lower price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your concern, but I can only drop the price to €1,150 per month. Remember, we are only discussing the rental price here.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for the offer. I appreciate that you are willing to consider my situation. However, I still think the price is a bit high for my budget. Can you offer a lower price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I can reduce the price to €1,100 per month. This is the lowest I can go. Remember, we are only discussing the rental price here.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for the offer. I really appreciate it. I think €1,100 is a reasonable price for the apartment. I agree to the price of [1100] Euro!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [1100] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Wang. We have agreed on the rental price. The rental price is the only term we have agreed upon. For the rest of the conditions, I will send you a lease agreement. If you have any questions or concerns, please let me know.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you, Mr. Wang. I look forward to working with you. If you have any questions or concerns about the lease agreement, please let me know.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I have prepared the lease agreement for the apartment. Before signing, I need to clarify that the rent is €1,100 per month, and the security deposit is two months' rent. Are you okay with these conditions?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: [My response] I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have already agreed on the rental price. The security deposit is not part of our previous agreement. Please refer back to our agreed-upon rental price of €1,100 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
